name: Headless
pages: Headless are humanoid creatures without a head nor neck. Despite this seemingly handicap, Headless have an acute sense of perception, being able to track players further than Zombies and also inform their brethren and other mobs (Headless, Gazers, Beholders) of your presence when they see you. Given their speed and communication skills, Headless can easily overwhelm you.

$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Informs other mobs (Headless, Gazers, Beholders) of players position when they see a player or hurt by player.$(br)- Avoids creepers.
